hadith.text: Narrated 'Imran bin Husain:that a group from Banu Tamim came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) so he said: "Have glad tidings O Banu Tamim." They said: "You have given us glad tidings, so then give something to us." He said: "So the face of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) changed.
